definition: lover (of art, sports etc)/amateur/enthusiast/fan
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this
hobbyist/amateur

sentences.english: She’s also an avid street skateboarder.
sentences.chinese: 她還是一個熱心的街頭滑板愛好者。

sentences.english: The tragedy of love between Jia Baoyu and Lin Daiyu is a great interest to the lovers of "Hong Xue"(study of A Dream of Red Mansions).
sentences.chinese: 寶黛愛情悲劇是“紅學”愛好者最爲關注的一個問題。

sentences.english: Country-music fans everywhere, know his big hits.
sentences.chinese: 全國各地音樂愛好者，知道他的點擊率較高。

sentences.english: At Kendall-Jackson we create exciting wines for all wine lovers to discover.
sentences.chinese: 在肯德傑克遜我們爲葡萄酒愛好者釀造了精彩的酒。

sentences.english: This is thenichethattypography enthusiasts guard with fervor.
sentences.chinese: 但印刷體愛好者還是熱衷此道。

sentences.english: In addition to climbing, the area is popular with hillwalkers and those interested in natural history.
sentences.chinese: 除攀巖外，這裏也深受走山族和自然史愛好者的喜愛。

sentences.english: Now days there are tens of thousands paragliding fans all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 如今，在世界各地，飛行傘愛好者已達數十萬。

sentences.english: The arctic village is you find north, explore photography fans to play, the best place to go.
sentences.chinese: 北極村是你找北，探索遊玩，攝影愛好者的最佳去處。

sentences.english: There are a number of sections of the refuge that are particularly good for birders and naturalists.
sentences.chinese: 保護區有許多區段特別吸引獵鳥者和自然愛好者。

sentences.english: You can just imagine what kind of sports fan Scalia must be.
sentences.chinese: 你可以想象，斯卡利亞會是哪種體育的愛好者。

sentences.english: Well-selected Beijing operas for your enjoyment .
sentences.chinese: 精選的京劇，京劇愛好者的聽覺享受。

sentences.english: The flattery monacal is a philatelic.
sentences.chinese: 那個阿諛的修道士是個集郵愛好者。

sentences.english: The movie has something for any Hong Kong cinephile.
sentences.chinese: 這部電影對於每個香港電影愛好者都有一定意義。

sentences.english: Welcome more lovers of English join our league.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎更多的英語愛好者加入華英社。

sentences.english: Chocolate lovers know that eating chocolate makes them happy.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力愛好者知道喫巧克力讓他們心情愉快。

sentences.english: Anime fans by Dan Zhu own micro-blog wrote.
sentences.chinese: 動漫愛好者朱依丹在自己的微博上這樣寫道。
